items.sentence: Take a step back and look at the bigger picture.
The government hasn't ruled out military action.
Did you know that there are carnivorous turtles?
I'll let you know by this evening at the latest.
Would it be OK if I ate the last slice of pizza?
Tom is going to show Mary how to unclog a drain.
This sentence can be translated in several ways.
I saw everyone was already there waiting for me.
I simply can't predict what the outcome will be.
I tend to judge people by the company they keep.
Why don't you pick on someone else for a change?
Why does Tom get to go to the party and I don't?
Why don't we just tell Tom that he has to leave?
That isn't the reason that Tom wants to do that.
Tom can be overbearing, but he's a generous man.
What kind of flowers do you have in your garden?
Things didn't happen the way I expected them to.
I can't remember the last time I left the house.
There's a drinking fountain by the tennis court.
Don't worry. We plan to get that done by Monday.
